name: librephotos
description: LibrePhotos is a self-hosted photo management platform, similar to Google Photos. It automatically organizes photos using AI, supports face recognition, timelines, tagging, and maps, while protecting user privacy.
features: AI Organization: Automatic photo tagging, Face recognition, Object detection. Organize photos intelligently.
Timeline & Maps: Photo timelines, Location mapping, Travel visualization. Browse photos by time and place.
Privacy-Focused: Self-hosted, No cloud tracking, Full data control. Google Photos alternative you own.
Search & Filter: Full-text search, Advanced filters, Smart albums. Find any photo instantly.
